title: ﻿न्यूजीलैंड की घटना पर शोक जताने वाले AMU स्टूडेंट्स पुलवामा व अमरनाथ के वक्त कहाँ थे ?
author: www.factcrescendo.com
vclaim:
Candle march at Aligarh Muslim University (The attack on a CRPF convoy in Jammu and Kashmir's Pulwama district). #RIP #Pulwama #CRPF #KashmirTerrorAttack pic.twitter.com/j7TghH6byn

We the AMU students condemn the attack on our soldiers and paying tributes to our brave martyrs soldiers in #PulwamaAttack. Candle light vigil at night. We stand with martyrs’ families, pray for speedy recovery of the injured.@zainabsikander @khanumarfa @iamrana pic.twitter.com/ORHNqdp7ve
